Class SimpleDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sk89q.intake.dispatcher.SimpleDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class SimpleDispatcher
extends Object
implements Dispatcher
    A simple implementation of Dispatcher.

      • getCommands

        public Set<CommandMapping> getCommands()
        Description copied from interface: Dispatcher
        Get a list of commands. Each command, regardless of how many aliases it may have, will only appear once in the returned set.

        The returned collection cannot be modified.

        Specified by:
        getCommands in interface Dispatcher
        Returns:
        a list of registrations

      • getAliases

        public Set<String> getAliases()
        Description copied from interface: Dispatcher
        Get a list of all the command aliases, which includes the primary alias.

        A command may have more than one alias assigned to it. The returned collection cannot be modified.

        Specified by:
        getAliases in interface Dispatcher
        Returns:
        a list of aliases

        public CommandMapping get(String alias)
        Description copied from interface: Dispatcher

      • call

        public boolean call(String arguments,
                    CommandLocals locals,
                    String[] parentCommands)
             throws CommandException,
                    AuthorizationException
        Description copied from interface: CommandCallable
        Execute the correct command based on the input.

        The implementing class must perform the necessary permission checks.

        Specified by:
        call in interface CommandCallable
        Parameters:
        arguments - the arguments
        locals - the locals
        parentCommands - a list of parent commands, with the first most entry being the top-level command
        Returns:
        the called command, or null if there was no command found
        Throws:
        CommandException - thrown on a command error
        AuthorizationException
